sentence: He did nothing to fight for his constituents and stop the most fraudulent election in American history.? Trump's statement, in which he continued to repeat false claims about election fraud, came a day after McConnell became the highest-ranking Republican elected official to criticize the RNC for the resolution censuring Reps. Liz Cheney (R-Wyo.)
title: Trump attacks McConnell after he criticizes RNC censure of two House Republicans probing Jan. 6 insurrection
